It shouldn't be magic... but I can’t say for certain."},{"lineNumber":64654,"originalJapaneseLine":"　内部構造は皆目見当が付かん」","translatedEnglishLine":"I have absolutely no idea about its internal structure.\""},{"lineNumber":64655,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そないなシロモノやったんか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So it was something like that...\""},{"lineNumber":64656,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔法で同じ事をしようとすれば、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If you tried to do the same thing with magic,"},{"lineNumber":64657,"originalJapaneseLine":"　LV2では難しかろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"it would be difficult at level 2."},{"lineNumber":64658,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それをこのように量産させるとはな。天晴れだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"To have it mass-produced like this—impressive.\""},{"lineNumber":64659,"originalJapaneseLine":"「製作者以外の者でも使える利便性も見事だな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The convenience that even those other than the creators can use it is also remarkable."},{"lineNumber":64660,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それを意図して作られたかは分からんが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Though I don't know if that was intentional...\""},{"lineNumber":64661,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、直せるのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, can it be fixed?\""},{"lineNumber":64662,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうだな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well,"},{"lineNumber":64663,"originalJapaneseLine":"　見たところ、発信の都度、異界は開かれている。","translatedEnglishLine":"from what I see, the Otherworld opens every time it transmits."},{"lineNumber":64664,"originalJapaneseLine":"　異常があるなら異界の中でのことだろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"If there's an issue, it would be something inside the Otherworld.\""},{"lineNumber":64665,"originalJapaneseLine":"「てことは……中に入って直すのか。入れるか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So... you have to enter inside and fix it. Very well!"},{"lineNumber":64670,"originalJapaneseLine":"　偉大なる貴様の主君に感謝するのだぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"You should thank your great lord.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 歩きましょうって流れになってるのよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's come to the point where we're supposed to take a walk.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何よりも健康に配慮すべきですものねえ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After all, we should prioritize health above all else.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最後にはよく分からない主旨に話を発展させながら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the end, she expanded the conversation into a topic that was hard to understand,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パトリシアは離れていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Patricia walked away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……行ったか……ふぅ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...She left... phew."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふむう……しかし一理はありますなあ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... but there's some truth in what she said.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コンピュータに依存が過ぎるのは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Being overly dependent on computers..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふむ……いや、これはなかなか面白い物だぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... no, this is actually quite an interesting thing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これがコンピュータ……そういうことか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So this is what a computer is... I see."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それまであれこれと空いたコンピュータを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Until then, Miracle had been fiddling with the unoccupied computers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 触って調べていたミラクルが、不意に顔を上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and suddenly looked up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ、ミラクル。何か分かるのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's up, Miracle? Did you figure something out?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「知りたいか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do you want to know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………あー、知りたい知りたい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Ah, yes, I want to know, I want to know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か分かるならさっさと言え」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you understand something, just tell me quickly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふっ、我が忠実なる下僕の頼みか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, is that a request from my faithful servant?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聞いてやらねば王の度量が問われるな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I don't listen, the king's generosity will be in question."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……いちいちあれをやらんと気が済まんのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Do you have to do that every single time to be satisfied?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しーっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これは、異界ゲート発生装置だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is an Otherworld Gate Generation Device."
"Huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん？　なんや、それが取り付けられて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hm? So that is installed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コンピュータに悪さしとる、んか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and it's messing with the computer?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「違う。このコンピュータの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No. This is about the computer's

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ネットワークそのものの話だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: network itself."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミラクルは説明する言葉を選ぶように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miracle, as if carefully choosing his words to explain,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一瞬口元に指を寄せた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: briefly brought a finger to his mouth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……これは、作動させると異界のゲートが開き、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...When activated, it opens a gate to the Otherworld,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこへ情報を送り込む仕組みになっている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and it’s designed to send information there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 受け取る時も同じだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Receiving works the same way."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えーっと……実はコンピュータは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um... so actually the computer

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法を発生させていた……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was generating magic...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうではない。魔法ではない……はずだがな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's not it. It shouldn't be magic... but I can’t say for certain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 内部構造は皆目見当が付かん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have absolutely no idea about its internal structure."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そないなシロモノやったんか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So it was something like that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔法で同じ事をしようとすれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you tried to do the same thing with magic,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: LV2では難しかろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it would be difficult at level 2.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それをこのように量産させるとはな。天晴れだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To have it mass-produced like this—impressive."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「製作者以外の者でも使える利便性も見事だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The convenience that even those other than the creators can use it is also remarkable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを意図して作られたかは分からんが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though I don't know if that was intentional..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、直せるのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, can it be fixed?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見たところ、発信の都度、異界は開かれている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: from what I see, the Otherworld opens every time it transmits.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 異常があるなら異界の中でのことだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If there's an issue, it would be something inside the Otherworld."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「てことは……中に入って直すのか。入れるか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So... you have to enter inside and fix it. Can you get in?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっはっは。誰に話し掛けている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ha ha ha. Who do you think you're talking to?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 余ならば造作もない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For me, it's no trouble at all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「面白そうだな。よーし、行くぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sounds interesting. Alright, let's go."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ、ははは！　よかろう！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, hahaha! Very well!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 偉大なる貴様の主君に感謝するのだぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You should thank your great lord."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 歩きましょうって流れになってるのよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's come to the point where we're supposed to take a walk.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何よりも健康に配慮すべきですものねえ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After all, we should prioritize health above all else.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最後にはよく分からない主旨に話を発展させながら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the end, she expanded the conversation into a topic that was hard to understand,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パトリシアは離れていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Patricia walked away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……行ったか……ふぅ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...She left... phew."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふむう……しかし一理はありますなあ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... but there's some truth in what she said.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コンピュータに依存が過ぎるのは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Being overly dependent on computers..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふむ……いや、これはなかなか面白い物だぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... no, this is actually quite an interesting thing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これがコンピュータ……そういうことか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So this is what a computer is... I see."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それまであれこれと空いたコンピュータを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Until then, Miracle had been fiddling with the unoccupied computers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 触って調べていたミラクルが、不意に顔を上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and suddenly looked up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ、ミラクル。何か分かるのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's up, Miracle? Did you figure something out?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「知りたいか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do you want to know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………あー、知りたい知りたい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Ah, yes, I want to know, I want to know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か分かるならさっさと言え」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you understand something, just tell me quickly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふっ、我が忠実なる下僕の頼みか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, is that a request from my faithful servant?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聞いてやらねば王の度量が問われるな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I don't listen, the king's generosity will be in question."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……いちいちあれをやらんと気が済まんのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Do you have to do that every single time to be satisfied?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しーっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これは、異界ゲート発生装置だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is an Otherworld Gate Generation Device."
"Huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん？　なんや、それが取り付けられて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hm? So that is installed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コンピュータに悪さしとる、んか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and it's messing with the computer?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「違う。このコンピュータの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No. This is about the computer's

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ネットワークそのものの話だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: network itself."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミラクルは説明する言葉を選ぶように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miracle, as if carefully choosing his words to explain,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一瞬口元に指を寄せた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: briefly brought a finger to his mouth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……これは、作動させると異界のゲートが開き、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...When activated, it opens a gate to the Otherworld,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこへ情報を送り込む仕組みになっている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and it’s designed to send information there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 受け取る時も同じだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Receiving works the same way."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えーっと……実はコンピュータは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um... so actually the computer

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法を発生させていた……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was generating magic...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうではない。魔法ではない……はずだがな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's not it. It shouldn't be magic... but I can’t say for certain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 内部構造は皆目見当が付かん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have absolutely no idea about its internal structure."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そないなシロモノやったんか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So it was something like that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔法で同じ事をしようとすれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you tried to do the same thing with magic,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: LV2では難しかろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it would be difficult at level 2.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それをこのように量産させるとはな。天晴れだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To have it mass-produced like this—impressive."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「製作者以外の者でも使える利便性も見事だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The convenience that even those other than the creators can use it is also remarkable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを意図して作られたかは分からんが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though I don't know if that was intentional..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、直せるのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, can it be fixed?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見たところ、発信の都度、異界は開かれている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: from what I see, the Otherworld opens every time it transmits.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 異常があるなら異界の中でのことだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If there's an issue, it would be something inside the Otherworld."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「てことは……中に入って直すのか。入れるか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So... you have to enter inside and fix it. Can you get in?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっはっは。誰に話し掛けている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ha ha ha. Who do you think you're talking to?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 余ならば造作もない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For me, it's no trouble at all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「面白そうだな。よーし、行くぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sounds interesting. Alright, let's go."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ、ははは！　よかろう！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, hahaha! Very well!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 偉大なる貴様の主君に感謝するのだぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You should thank your great lord."
